info: T means true, F means False. If no publications, just leave the publication structure unchanged.
name: John Erik Fornæss

Fornæss, John Erik; Kim, Kang-Tae. (2015) Some problems. Springer Proceedings in Mathematics & statistics. vol. 144.
Fornæss, John Erik; Wold, Erlend Fornæss. (2015) An estimate for the squeezing function and estimates of invariant metrics. Springer Proceedings in Mathematics & statistics. vol. 144.
Bracci, Filippo; Fornæss, John Erik. (2014) The range of holomorphic maps at boundary points. Mathematische Annalen. vol. 359 (3-4).
Fornæss, John Erik; Lee, Lina; Zhang, Yuan. (2014) Formal complex curves in real smooth hypersurfaces. Illinois Journal of Mathematics. vol. 58 (1).
Fornæss, John Erik; Rong, Feng. (2014) Classification of recurrent domains for holomorphic maps on complex projective spaces. Journal of Geometric Analysis. vol. 24 (2).
